name: Azuna Air Freshener & Odor Eliminator for Strong Odor | 2 Room Kit Includes (2) Empty Luxe Glass Jar & 12oz Gel Refill with Tea Tree Essential Oil | Simply Citrus | Last 60-90 Days
short_description: Powerful Odor Eliminator for Home & Beyond: Say goodbye to stale, stuffy air! Azuna Fresh odor eliminator for home uses the natural power of Australian Tea Tree Oil to neutralize odors at their source, tackling tough smells from food, smoke, pets, and more. A Strong room deodorizer odor eliminator that naturally removes unwanted smells and keeps your home smelling clean.

Long-Lasting Room Freshener for Home: Enjoy continuous freshness for up to 60-90 days with Azuna's long lasting formula keeping your space smelling clean without the need for constant replacements. Just refill the jar with fresh gel when needed for a sustainable, reusable odor absorber solution. Ideal solution for those seeking room fresheners for home long lasting, delivering a natural and continuous freshness that keeps odors away.

Non-Toxic & Pet-Friendly Air Freshener: Unlike artificial sprays, Azuna is a non-toxic air freshener for home, making it safe for families and pets. Whether you're looking for a bathroom air freshener odor eliminator or a dog odor eliminator for home, Azuna provides a gentle yet effective solution without harmful chemicals. Azuna’s gel air freshener for home provide a natural and effective way to eliminate odors, using the power of tea tree oil to keep your space smelling fresh.

How does it work? Azuna doesn't mask with scent, it makes your air smell like air again. Azuna is a low concentrate tea tree oil gel that releases particles into the air through evaporative diffusion rather than through droplets like in a high concentrate diffuser. Azuna neutralizes odors in the air of the room which it is placed in.

Plant-based, Safe & Manufactured in the USA: It is also Non-Toxic, Phthalate-Free, Cruelty-free, Biodegradable, Vegan, and has NO parabens, NO phosphates, NO formaldehyde, NO synthetic dyes, NO ammonia, or NO chlorine bleach. Azuna can be used as a natural pet odor eliminator for home, effectively neutralizing smells and keeping your space fresh without harsh chemicals.

name: Arm & Hammer Fragrance Free Refillable Moisture Absorber and Odor Eliminator 14 oz. Tub
short_description: Arm & Hammer Refillable Moisture Absorber and Odor Eliminator attracts and traps excess moisture, eliminating musty odors.
This refillable tub is a convenient, effective way to prevent humid stale air from causing unpleasant odors in your home, office or storage space.
Ideal for use in closets, laundry rooms, and mud rooms, where excess moisture and stagnant air are a nuisance.
This 14-ounce tub offers long lasting freshness for up to 60 Days. Duration will vary based on temperature and humidity.

To use, simply remove plastic lid, peel off foil cover and replace the lid. Once the moisture absorbing crystals have fully dissolved, discard the remaining water and refill for long-lasting freshness.
product_description: The Arm & Hammer Refillable Moisture Absorber and Odor Eliminator 14-ounce tub is your convenient solution for continuous cleaner fresher air. This musty odor eliminator works by attracting and trapping excess moisture to maintain an optimal humidity level. It works as an odor absorber, shoe deodorizer, or room freshener where moisture is an issue. To use this odor eliminator, simply remove lid, peel off foil cover, replace the lid, and place in area where excess moisture or stale odor is a problem. Once moisture absorbing crystals have fully dissolved, discard the collected water and refill. This automatic air freshener works like a dehumidifier but without electricity or batteries. Just place where there is moisture or a stale smell and watch as the odor-causing water collects inside the container. Keep out of reach of children. Read and follow all label directions.
